title: Episode 2: Steve the Urban Caveman
description:
Steve is a primal enthusiast who authors a blog called "The Urban Caveman." We discuss his passion for primal living and his interest in gardening and cooking with foods our ancestors lived on 30 000 years ago. 

Check out his blog here
twitter: @UrbanCavemanYYC 
Instagram: _urbancaveman_
facebook: @urbancaveman.ca
website: www.urbancaveman.ca

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
Instragram: @theother95
facebook @theother95page


Steve mentions how he manages his gallstones through diet instead of surgery. This is not to be considered medical advice. It is simply his personal experience. Gallbladder disease is a serious issue that can lead to dangerous complications, including infection, and death, if left untreated. Any attempts to manage gallbladder disease through diet should be done under medical supervision. For many, too much damage has already been done, and the only option for treatment will be surgical removal.
